title: Slums/structures under renewal situated on lands reserved/designated/allotted for existing or propos
clause_text: Slums/structures under renewal situated on lands reserved/designated/allotted for existing or proposed non-buildable reservations such as playground, garden, park and any other open users in the Final DP occupied by existing slums/structures under renewal shall be shifted within the same planning sector in which such plots belongs/vests and sites occupied by them shall be cleared for the implementation of DRP in which such quantum of designated/allotted for existing or proposed non-buildable reservation shall be fully
